betterquesting:10.desc:8:
While I do not dare take change of the Sacred Cinders, their powers will still play a role in reconstruction and recovery.
It is from the ashes of an Empire that new seeds of rebirth will find sustenance.
Sacred Cinders magic, in its essence, revolves around vegetal life.
The journey to full-fledged Sacred Cinders life, which shall bless the return of the universe to freedom, will take some time, but this is what will start the process.
An acorn.
